TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit BadImageFormatException extends System.SystemException

summary.span: 当动态链接库 (DLL) 或可执行程序的文件映像无效时引发的异常。

span.span: The exception that is thrown when the file image of a dynamic link library (DLL) or an executable program is invalid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 动态链接库 （.dll 文件） 或可执行文件 （.exe 文件） 的文件格式不符合公共语言运行时所需格式时，引发此异常。This exception is thrown when the file format of a dynamic link library (.dll file) or an executable (.exe file) doesn’t conform to the format that the common language runtime expects. 具体而言，在以下情况下引发异常：In particular, the exception is thrown under the following conditions: - 早期版本的.NET Framework 实用程序，如 ILDasm.exe 或 installutil.exe，用于在开发时更高版本的.NET framework 程序集。An earlier version of a .NET Framework utility, such as ILDasm.exe or installutil.exe, is used with an assembly that was developed with a later version of the .NET Framework. 若要解决此异常，使用的工具，用于开发程序集的.NET framework 的版本相对应的版本。To address this exception, use the version of the tool that corresponds to the version of the .NET Framework that was used to develop the assembly. 这可能需要修改`Path`环境变量或提供正确的可执行文件的完全限定的路径。This may require modifying the `Path` environment variable or providing a fully qualified path to the correct executable. - 要加载的非托管动态链接库或可执行文件 （如 Windows 系统 DLL），就好像是.NET Framework 程序集。You are trying to load an unmanaged dynamic link library or executable (such as a Windows system DLL) as if it were a .NET Framework assembly. 下面的示例阐释了这一点通过使用方法以加载 Kernel32.dll。The following example illustrates this by using the method to load Kernel32.dll. [!code-csharp[System.BadImageFormatException.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.badimageformatexception.class/cs/condition1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.BadImageFormatException.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.badimageformatexception.class/vb/condition1.vb#1)] 若要解决此异常，访问通过使用您的开发语言，如提供的功能在 DLL 中定义的方法`Declare`在 Visual Basic 中的语句或属性与`extern`C# 中的关键字。To address this exception, access the methods defined in the DLL by using the features provided by your development language, such as the `Declare` statement in Visual Basic or the attribute with the `extern` keyword in C#. - 要加载的仅限反射的上下文之外的上下文中引用程序集。You are trying to load a reference assembly in a context other than the reflection-only context. 您可以解决此问题在两种方法之一：You can address this issue in either of two ways: - 您可以加载实现程序集而不是引用程序集。You can load the implementation assembly rather than the reference assembly. - 您可以通过调用加载仅反射上下文中的引用程序集方法。You can load the reference assembly in the reflection-only context by calling the method. - DLL 或可执行文件已加载，作为 64 位程序集，但它包含 32 位功能或资源。A DLL or executable is loaded as a 64-bit assembly, but it contains 32-bit features or resources. 例如，它依赖于 COM 互操作或调用 32 位动态链接库中的方法。For example, it relies on COM interop or calls methods in a 32-bit dynamic link library. 若要解决此异常，请将项目的设置**目标平台**属性设置为 x86 （而不是 x64 或 AnyCPU） 并重新编译。To address this exception, set the project's **Platform target** property to x86 (instead of x64 or AnyCPU) and recompile. - 使用不同版本的.NET Framework 创建了应用程序的组件。Your application’s components were created using different versions of the .NET Framework. 通常情况下，会发生此异常时应用程序或使用开发的组件[!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)]或[!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)]尝试加载使用开发的程序集[!INCLUDE[net_v20SP1_short](~/includes/net-v20sp1-short-md.md)]或更高版本，或当使用开发的应用程序[!INCLUDE[net_v20SP1_short](~/includes/net-v20sp1-short-md.md)]或[!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)]尝试加载使用开发的程序集[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]或更高版本。Typically, this exception occurs when an application or component that was developed using the [!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)] or the [!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)] tries to load an assembly that was developed using the [!INCLUDE[net_v20SP1_short](~/includes/net-v20sp1-short-md.md)] or later, or when an application that was developed using the [!INCLUDE[net_v20SP1_short](~/includes/net-v20sp1-short-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)] tries to load an assembly that was developed using the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] or later. 可能被报告为编译时错误，或在运行时，可能会引发异常。The may be reported as a compile-time error, or the exception may be thrown at run time. 下面的示例定义`StringLib`具有一个成员，类`ToProperCase`，，并驻留在名为 StringLib.dll 程序集。The following example defines a `StringLib` class that has a single member, `ToProperCase`, and that resides in an assembly named StringLib.dll. [!code-csharp[System.BadImageFormatException.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.badimageformatexception.class/cs/stringlib.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.BadImageFormatException.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.badimageformatexception.class/vb/stringlib.vb#2)] 下面的示例使用反射加载名为 StringLib.dll 程序集。The following example uses reflection to load an assembly named StringLib.dll. 如果使用编译的源代码[!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)]编译器引发的方法。If the source code is compiled with a [!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)] compiler, a is thrown by the method. [!code-csharp[System.BadImageFormatException.Class#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.badimageformatexception.class/cs/loadstringlib.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.BadImageFormatException.Class#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.badimageformatexception.class/vb/loadstringlib.vb#3)] 若要解决此异常，请确保执行其代码和引发异常，并且要同时加载的程序集的程序集面向的.NET framework 的兼容版本。To address this exception, make sure that the assembly whose code is executing and that throws the exception, and the assembly to be loaded both target compatible versions of the .NET Framework. - 应用程序的组件的目标不同的平台。The components of your application target different platforms. 例如，要将在 x86 ARM 程序集加载应用程序。For example, you are trying to load ARM assemblies in an x86 application. 可以使用以下命令行实用程序来确定各个.NET Framework 程序集的目标平台。You can use the following command-line utility to determine the target platforms of individual .NET Framework assemblies. 应为以空格分隔的列表，在命令行提供的文件列表。The list of files should be provided as a space-delimited list at the command line. [!code-csharp[System.BadImageFormatException.Class#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.badimageformatexception.class/cs/targetplatform1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.BadImageFormatException.Class#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.badimageformatexception.class/vb/targetplatform1.vb#4)] - 对 C++ 可执行文件进行反射可能会引发此异常。Reflecting on C++ executable files may throw this exception. 这极有可能是因为 C++ 编译器从可执行文件中剥离重定位地址或 .Reloc 节引起的。This is most likely caused by the C++ compiler stripping the relocation addresses or the .Reloc section from the executable file. 若要保留.relocation 地址中的 c + + 可执行文件，请指定 / 已修复： 无链接时。To preserve the .relocation address in a C++ executable file, specify /fixed:no when linking. 使用 HRESULT COR_E_BADIMAGEFORMAT，其值 0x8007000B。 uses the HRESULT COR_E_BADIMAGEFORMAT, which has the value 0x8007000B. 有关实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructors.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数初始化为系统提供的错误进行描述，如"可执行文件或库的格式无效。"的消息的新实例的属性This constructor initializes the property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "Format of the executable or library is invalid." 此消息将当前系统区域性考虑在内。This message takes into account the current system culture. 下表显示 的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|“值”Value| |--------------|-----------| ||空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 `Nothing`）。A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| ||本地化的错误消息字符串。The localized error message string.|

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message) cil managed

span.span: The message that describes the error.

summary.span: 用指定的错误消息初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `message` 参数的内容应为人所理解。The content of the `message` parameter is intended to be understood by humans. 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture. 下表显示 的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|“值”Value| |--------------|-----------| ||空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 `Nothing`）。A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| ||错误消息字符串。The error message string.|

summary.span: 用序列化数据初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with serialized data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数在反序列化过程中调用，以便重建通过流传输的异常对象。This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message, class System.Exception inner) cil managed
Public Sub New (message As String, inner As Exception)

param.name: message
param.span: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

span.span: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.

param.name: inner

span.span: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.

param.span: 如果 inner 参数不为空引用，则在处理内部异常的 块中引发当前异常。

span.span: If the inner parameter is not a null reference, the current exception is raised in a block that handles the inner exception.

summary.span: 使用指定的错误消息和对作为此异常原因的内部异常的引用来初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因前一个异常而直接引发的异常应在 属性中包含对前一个异常的引用。An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the property. 属性返回的值与传递到构造函数中的值相同；或者，如果 `null` 属性没有向构造函数提供内部异常值，则为 。The property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor. 下表显示 的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|“值”Value| |--------------|-----------| ||内部异常引用。The inner exception reference.| ||错误消息字符串。The error message string.|

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property FileName As String
public: property System::String ^ FileName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取导致该异常的文件的名称。

span.span: Gets the name of the file that causes this exception.

value.span: 带有无效图像的文件的名称，或一个空引用（如果未向当前实例的构造函数传递任何文件名）。

span.span: The name of the file with the invalid image, or a null reference if no file name was passed to the constructor for the current instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果有，则此属性返回为当前实例的构造函数提供的文件的名称。This property returns the name of the file supplied to the constructor for the current instance, if any. 如果未指定的文件的名称，或为空引用 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)，此属性将返回空引用。If the file name was not specified or is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), this property returns a null reference. 此属性是只读的。This property is read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property Message As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Message { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取错误消息和引发此异常的文件的名称。

span.span: Gets the error message and the name of the file that caused this exception.

value.span: 包含错误消息和引发此异常的文件名称的字符串。

span.span: A string containing the error message and the name of the file that caused this exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果没有消息提供给当前异常的构造函数，此属性将返回系统提供的错误消息。If no message was supplied to the constructor for the current exception, this property returns a system-supplied error message. 如果属性不是 null 引用 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)，该消息包含的文件的名称。If the property is not a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), the message includes the file name. 此属性是只读的。This property is read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string ToString() cil managed
Public Overrides Function ToString () As String

summary.span: 返回该异常的完全限定名，还可能返回错误消息、内部异常的名称和堆栈跟踪。

span.span: Returns the fully qualified name of this exception and possibly the error message, the name of the inner exception, and the stack trace.

returns.span: 一个字符串，包含该异常的完全限定名，还可能包含错误信息、内部异常的名称和堆栈跟踪。

span.span: A string containing the fully qualified name of this exception and possibly the error message, the name of the inner exception, and the stack trace.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回的字符串表示形式包含异常的值的名称属性、 调用的结果`ToString`内部异常的值上属性，并调用的结果.The string representation returned by this method includes the name of the exception, the value of the property, the result of calling `ToString` on the inner exception, the value of the property, and the result of calling . 如果任何这些成员为 null 引用 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)，其值不包括在返回的字符串。If any of these members is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), its value is not included in the returned string.
